#+property: header-args :mkdirp yes :main no

#+begin_src bazel-workspace :tangle WORKSPACE
workspace(name = "root")
#+end_src

#+begin_src bazel-build :tangle BUILD
cc_test(
    name = "cc_test",
    srcs = ["cc_test.cc"],
)
#+end_src

#+begin_src C++ :tangle cc_test.cc
// Comment
TEST(FooTest, Bar) {
  EXPECT_EQ(1, 2);
}
TEST_F(BazTest, Qux) {
  EXPECT_EQ(4, 5);
}
#+end_src
